title: Happy Keen Day!
content: Well it's the morning of 2006-03-14 (at least in my timezone) so Happy Keen Day!  I'm looking forward to the flood of mods people have been waiting until today to release, but make sure you get them out there before Mortimer Day tomorrow [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

title: Re: Happy Keen Day!
content:
Mort's day is still a national holiday in Hungary so I'll only celebrate that. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img]

Not really, the election is here in two months and the political parties use the holiday as an excuse to advertise themselves and send hate messages to their opponents. So it is a true Mort's Day [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] [hr]The human brain is not user-friendly...

title: Re: Happy Keen Day!
content:
Ha! I have entirely not noticed until right now when you said it! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Cool! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-birthday.gif[/img] Time to get me some pizza to celebrate this, once it's day time and shops are open, and I'm awake.

Hopefully there'll be some nice stuff, too bad I have nothing to contribute for this day.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

content: I think we're going to be eating pie in calc.[url=http://spatang.com/ck][img]http://spatang.com/ck/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/cosmo][img]http://spatang.com/cosmo/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://spatang.com/nukem][img]http://www.spatang.com/nukem/bannersm.jpg[/img][/url] [img]http://spatang.com/scrobblersig.php[/img]

title: Happy... a lot of things...
content:
Ah... Najawa stops in, and says:

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mort.gif[/img] "Happy Mort's Eve"

and while your at it:

"Happy pi day" (In math class, we ate a cherry pie, baked in a 9 x 9! Pi's truely R sqare!)

And if I don't have the pleasure of dropping in tomorrow; Happy Mort Day

or "Happy Evil Genius' Day!"

title: Keen Day For All
content:
Happy Keen Day! It was yesterday for me. I did remember it, but have kept clear from my usual haunts for a day or two. Let us take a moment to think back on what brings us all here--why we became Keeners in the first place--and possibly post some of our thoughts in [url=http://p072.ezboard.com/fpubliccommanderkeenforumothercommanderkeenstuff.showMessage?topicID=1215.topic]Aint it funny?[/url].

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]
